_sText:
De_Damnation v1.0
----------------------
Also available for gun game (In .rar.)

My 4th map remake from one of the many maps found in Bungie's game, Halo.
This remake isn't exact however if offers the same layout.
(I don't know how to make waterfalls which is the only thing missing in this map.)
for the DE version, CT's have a slight advantage. (higher elevation) 
So if you want a challenge, Join the T's.

This map has:

-40 Spawnpoints
-HDR
-Buyzones for GunGame version.
-Reduced gravity to 0.8 (1 being normal gravity.)

I've spent a month (procrastinating included) making this map/getting the layout right.
So if you say anything about there being not enough props 
I'll slap you across the face then kill you in your sleep. (Not really.)

You can find this map on: 209.247.83.162:27015
